---
pagetitle: CSS Units - Step 2
example:
  title: CSS Units - Step 2
  instructions: |-
    Set the `font-size` of the various components on the page. Try using absolute units, like `px`, `cm`, and `in`.
  runtime: repl
  mode:
    document: html
  initial:
    js: ~
    css: |-
      outer {
        font-size: 16px;
      }
      .inner {

      }
      .outer p {

      }
      .inner p {

      }
      .paragraph-two {

      }
      .outer h2 {

      }
      .outer .inner h2 {

      }
  solution:
    js: ~
    css: |-
      outer {
        font-size: 16px;
      }
      .inner {
        font-size: 18px;
      }
      .outer p {
        font-size: 20px;
      }
      .inner p {
        font-size: 0.5cm;
      }
      .outer .paragraph-three {
        font-size: 0.25in;
      }
      .outer h2 {
        font-size: 18px;
      }
      .outer .inner h2 {
        font-size: 24px;
      }
output: js4shiny::html_document_js4shiny
